page.title: 03OTTERTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Otterton Primary School}which is situated by the church, is small with 3 classes and a small playground. This is 70 paces long and is thin at one end and wide at the other. We have about 60 pupils, and lots of people help to run our school like teachers, dinner ladies,dinnertime supervisor, our secretary and caretaker. We haven't any{school uniform}at the moment,but we will have in September '85. It will be grey skirts for girls,grey trousers for boys with blue or grey socks and royal blue jumper. At dinner you can go home or bring a packed lunch, we have school dinners but not many people eat them in our school,about 10 out of 60. The meals are brought in from Newton Poppleford Primary School.
